long_description: The RFID Document Organizer from REI deters ID theft with zippered protection of your travel documents. It blocks access to personal data stored on embedded micro chips. Special liner helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside passports and credit and debit cards. Unlined mesh (nonblocking) pocket displays your most-used ID, and secures with rip-and-stick tab. 2 zippered compartments accommodate passport, cash and cards; slip-in pocket holds travel documents. Water-resistant, ripstop nylon stands up to wear and tear. Adjustable neck strap.
short_description: The RFID Document Organizer from REI deters ID theft with zippered protection of your travel documents. It blocks access to personal data stored on embedded micro chips.
